snippet: Weeks after the Supreme Court ruled that same-sex marriage is a constitutional right, many at the Family Leadership Summit in Ames, Iowa, said they felt that the country is facing a war against religious freedom.
abstract: Weeks after the Supreme Court ruled that same-sex marriage is a constitutional right, many at the Family Leadership Summit in Ames, Iowa, said they felt that the country is facing a war against religious freedom.

headline.main: Conservative Christians in Iowa See Existential Problem

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
